1565354906_1GFU4qAMTFnQJ7W7r98Zj2xJWq1ev.body: Haha, wow. And? No shit you can see peoples' IP address. There's no excuse to not be using Tor or a VPN at this point, though, especially considering that Tor is free. All I've seen so far is that people have been murdered to take down 8chan and then resistance to use ZeroNet from the media, 4chan, and other websites. They are scared.
